title: fizzbuzz challenge
description: Write a program that prints numbers from 1 to 100. For multiples of 3, print 'Fizz', and for multiples of 5, print 'Buzz'. For numbers that are multiples of both, print 'FizzBuzz'.
instructions: Implement logic to check divisors and print appropriate strings based on conditions.

title: reverse string
description: Write a function that reverses a given string.
instructions: Given a string, return the reversed version of it without using built-in reverse methods.

title: sum of array
description: Write a program that takes an array of integers and returns the sum of all the elements.
instructions: You are provided an array of integers. Return the sum of its elements.

title: find maximum number
description: Write a program to find the maximum number in a given array of integers.
instructions: You are provided an array of integers. Return the maximum number in the array.

title: string manipulation challenge
description: Split a given string based on a delimiter and return an array.
instructions:
### Instructions
- Implement a function that takes two arguments:
  - A string `inputString`
  - A string `delimiter`
- Split the `inputString` using the `delimiter` and return the resulting array.

### Example
```javascript
splitString("a,b,c", ","); // ["a", "b", "c"]
```
